languages.text: "Разумный порядок, при котором мудрые и высокопоставленные переделывают низших под свои нужды".
"A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."
languages.original_text: "Разумный порядок, при котором мудрые и высокопоставленные переделывают низших под свои нужды".

traits.locale_text: "A sensible order of things where the wise and highly-placed remake the lessers to suit their needs."
"A sensible order of things where the wise and highly-placed remake the lessers to suit their needs."
"A sensible order of things where the wise and high-status ones remould the inferiors to suit their needs."
"A sensible order of things where the wise and high-status ones remould the inferiors to suit their needs."
"A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."
"A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."

languages.text: 「賢く、地位の高い者が、自分たちのニーズに合うように下級の者を変える。物事の現実的な道理だ」
languages.original_text: "A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."

traits.locale_text: 「賢く、地位の高い者が、自分たちのニーズに合うように下級の者を変える。物事の現実的な道理だ」

languages.text: “这样的规矩不无道理。位高权重、拥有智慧的上等人有权改造下等人，从而满足他们的需要。”
languages.original_text: "A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."

traits.locale_text: “这样的秩序不无道理。位高权重、拥有智慧的上等人有权改造下等人，从而满足他们的需要。”

languages.text: «Una forma sensata de hacer las cosas. La gente sabia con gran estatus remodela a sus inferiores para adaptarlos a sus necesidades».
languages.original_text: "A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."

traits.locale_text: «Es un sistema muy racional: los sabios nobles remodelan a sus inferiores para ajustarlos a sus necesidades».

languages.text: "Eine vernünftige Art, Dinge zu erledigen: Jene mit Weisheit und hohem Rang formen ihre Untergebenen für ihre Zwecke um."
languages.original_text: "A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."

traits.locale_text: "Eine vernünftige Ordnung der Dinge, in der die Weisen und Höherwertigen die Niederen ihren Bedürfnissen entsprechend umformen."

languages.text: « C'est l'ordre naturel des choses : les sages et puissants remodèlent les faibles pour répondre à leurs besoins. »
languages.original_text: "A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."

traits.locale_text: « C'est l'ordre naturel des choses : les puissants remodèlent les faibles pour répondre à leurs besoins. »

languages.text: "Mantıklı bir sistem. Bilgelik ve yüksek statü sahipleri, astlarını ihtiyaçlarına göre şekle sokarlar."
languages.original_text: "A sensible way of doing things: where those with wisdom and high status remould their inferiors to suit their needs."

traits.locale_text: "İşleri halletmek için mantıklı bir yol. Bilgeliğe ve yüksek statüye sahip olanlar, astlarını ihtiyaçlarına göre şekle sokarlar."
